item.description: Google released a new service called Google Latitude. This service enables you to see the location of your friends, collegues, etc. Here is a nice video explaining how Google Latitute workes: [youtube Q-Oq-9enE-k] Related articles by Zemanta {.zemanta-related-title} Google launches Latitude tool to help you track friends and family (telegraph.co.uk) Blinkx adds couch potato mode to video site (news.cnet.com) What is Google Latitude- a new Social networking tool and how to use it?
